alert.note: Alert for Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 4:42AM EST until January 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM EST /3 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to a quarter of an inch. Ice accumulations in excess of a quarter of an inch possible. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...From 4 PM EST /3 PM CST/ Monday to 1 PM EST /noon CST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions may impact the commute this evening. Hazardous travel is expected Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of snow, sleet and freezing rain are likely this afternoon. Ice accumulations in excess of a quarter of an inch are possible, especially northwest of a line from Monticello to Warsaw to Hillsdale.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
